lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Dodgers desperately needed a stopper to end their six-game losing streak. Up stepped Clayton Kershaw, with his arm and bat.

headline.print_headline: Kershaw: 3-Hitter, 14 Ks, RBI Single, Dodgers Top Pads 1-0
headline.main: Kershaw: 3-Hitter, 14 Ks, RBI Single, Dodgers Top Pads 1-0
